overview: Good-natured astronomer Sam is devastated when the love of his life leaves him for a suave Frenchman. He therefore does what every other normal dumpee would do — go to New York and set up home in the abandoned building opposite his ex-girlfriend's apartment, wait until she decides to leave her current lover, and then win her back.
tagline: A Comedy About Lost Loves And Last Laughs
cast: Meg Ryan|Matthew Broderick|Kelly Preston|Tchéky Karyo|Maureen Stapleton
